remarks: Proportional functionals have equal kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lkreq.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkreq.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lkreq.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
lkreq.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkreq.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkreq.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
lkreq.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
lkreq.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lkreq.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( R \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lkreq.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
lkreq.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( A .x. H ) ) $.
lkreqN $p |- ( ph -> ( K ` G ) = ( K ` H ) ) $.
